About Me

Hello! My name is Rajveer Mashruwala, and I am currently pursuing a diploma in Computer Programming and Analysis at Durham College. My passion for technology and problem-solving drives me to explore the intricacies of software development, with a keen focus on full-stack programming, database management, and system design. Through my coursework, I’ve honed my skills in languages like Java, Python, and JavaScript, as well as frameworks such as React and Node.js, preparing me to tackle real-world technical challenges.

Beyond academics, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects and staying updated with emerging tech trends. My goal is to leverage my technical expertise to build scalable solutions that address business needs while fostering innovation. Outside coding, I unwind by hiking and experimenting with photography, balancing creativity with analytical thinking.
